item.title: TABConf 2022 Ticket
item.dc:creator: TABConf
item.description:
Full access to TABConf 2022.

The post TABConf 2022 Ticket appeared first on TABConf 2022.
item.content:encoded:
October 12 – 15, 2022. This ticket gives you full access to TABConf 2022. Lunch is provided on the 2 main conference days, but not the workshop day. This also grants you admission to the afterparty!

If you have previously purchased a TABConf 2022 ticket and would like to sell or transfer it to someone else, please go here.

The post TABConf 2022 Ticket appeared first on TABConf 2022.

item.title: Chess Tournament
item.dc:creator: TABConf
item.description:
Chess tournament. 100k sats buy-in, winner take all! Single round elimination for winners. Losers battle it out for worst player in a “loser stay bracket”. The best and worst players at TABConf get bragging rights. Location: TBD (Near or at TABConf). Note: Because the buy-in is denominated in bitcoin and not dollars, you can not…

The post Chess Tournament appeared first on TABConf 2022.
item.content:encoded:
Chess tournament. 100k sats buy-in, winner take all! Single round elimination for winners. Losers battle it out for worst player in a “loser stay bracket”. The best and worst players at TABConf get bragging rights. Location: TBD (Near or at TABConf).

Note: Because the buy-in is denominated in bitcoin and not dollars, you can not purchase this in the same transaction as a ticket or challenge coin (even if you choose to pay for those items in bitcoin). Purchase your chess tournament buy-in in a separate transaction from your ticket!

The post Chess Tournament appeared first on TABConf 2022.

item.title: Silver Challenge Coin
item.dc:creator: TABConf
item.description:
Each year we make new die-molds to create unique coins with an awesome design for TABConf. These are physical collectable Bitcoin coins that are only produced the year of the event. By purchasing a ticket to TABConf you are eligible to receive a free physical copper coin (while supplies last). Guarantee yourself a coin of…

The post Silver Challenge Coin appeared first on TABConf 2022.
item.content:encoded:
Each year we make new die-molds to create unique coins with an awesome design for TABConf. These are physical collectable Bitcoin coins that are only produced the year of the event. By purchasing a ticket to TABConf you are eligible to receive a free physical copper coin (while supplies last). Guarantee yourself a coin of higher value for the conference by optionally purchasing a solid silver coin.

The coin will contain a clue that is used for the ongoing “Capture the Bitcoin” scavenger hunt at the conference.

Notes

  • Bullion grade coin
  • The silver round will be a standard 1 troy ounce weight.
  • Purchasing a coin alone is NOT a ticket to the conference.

The post Silver Challenge Coin appeared first on TABConf 2022.
